question: Who Becomes First Ever Football Player to Score 350 La Liga Goals?
explanation: Barcelona forward Lionel Messi scored a second-half brace against Alaves becoming the first ever player to score 350 goals in La Liga. Messi's best goal tally for a season came in 2011/12 when he netted 50 goals in 37 appearances. Messi has been La Liga's all-time leading scorer for a few years now - the previous record was held by Telmo Zarra, with 251 career goals.
